theme.title: Theme
theme.description:
Theme for decorating misspelt words, one of:
  - 'background-box': fills the background of the misspelt word;
  - 'wavy-underline': underline with wavelets (note: Chrome has a bug which prevents rendering of wavelets under some very short words)
  - 'dotted-underline': underline with dotted style

ignore.title: Words to be ignored by the spellchecker
ignore.description: Case-sensitive list of words to be ignored

mimeTypes.title: MIME types for files/editors for which the spellchecking should be activated
mimeTypes.description: List of MIME types. GFM denotes GitHub Flavored Markdown
